So Buffett took a $1 billion stake in Activision mere weeks before Microsoft acquired it? Despite no position in any other gaming stocks like Take-Two or Roblox or EA? 

Could this have possibly been any more obvious? Will the SEC actually do something or the investigation seems too difficult here? 😂😂😂

Warren Buffett took $1B stake in Activision Blizzard before Microsoft deal 

Famed investor Warren Buffett's firm, Berkshire Hathaway, acquired shares of video game giant Activision Blizzard worth nearly $1 billion during the fourth quarter – weeks before Microsoft bought the company for $68.7 billion.

The recent stock surge means Buffett’s firm is already set up for a tidy on-paper profit worth approximately $975 million at the time of Berkshire Hathaway's 13F filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission.

The timing of the acquisition could raise eyebrows given Buffett’s decades-long friendship with Bill Gates".

https://nypost.com/2022/02/15/warren-buffett-had-1b-stake-in-activision-before-microsoft-deal/
